statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{6 \, x^{3} + 7 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x , -x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 2 , -2 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 4 , 22 \, x^{3} + 23 \, x^{2} - 22 \, x - 16 , -4 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
